attributes.action: Review the Special Needs Education System
attributes.additional_details: I want to end the suffering of autistic people and people with SEND. No parent should ever have to fight for their child and no autistic child or with SEND should have to suffer alone just because the education system stops them getting help.
attributes.background:
This education system means autistic people and people with SEND are made to suffer alone before getting help. 

The system really is broken and not fit for purpose. 

No parent should ever have to fight for their child. 

System level reform is required to achieve real change.

rejection.details:
The Government has recently published a plan which aims to ensure children and young people across England with special educational needs and disabilities (SEND) or in alternative provision (AP) will get high-quality, early support wherever they live in the country.

You can find out more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/transformational-reform-begins-for-children-and-young-people-with-send

If there is a specific action you want the Government to take to improve education for SEND children you could start a petition about that.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for special educational needs and disabilities (SEND) education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634116

Introduce a regulator to oversee the EHCP process: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632941

Review how local authorities support children with special educational needs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632517
